name: Pepe's Backrooms misadventures
description:
Last time I released a spooky game for Halloween, so decided to do it again. It is a special version of Pepe's Epic Adventure where Pepe gets stuck in the backrooms, is it even possible to escape? I think my game is actually hard enough already, so there's only 1 level, if someone somehow wins I'll prolly update the game with the extra layers, a total of 5 were planned.

Controls are listed ingame.

Attributions Development
  • CyberRobotnix
Sound effects
  • Dan Knoflicek
  • CyberRobotnix

See also Pepe's Epic Adventure attributions if I'm missing anyone.
